TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstanceData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Holds instance data associated with a performance counter sample.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example displays the contents of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceData> objects that exist in a particular <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory> on the local computer. It first displays a numbered list of <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> categories. After the user enters the number of one of the categories, the sample displays, for each <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter> in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory>, the instance data associated with each instance of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter>.
[!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo/CPP/instdatacopyto.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo/CS/instdatacopyto.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo/VB/instdatacopyto.vb#1)]

Docs.param: The name of an instance associated with the performance counter.
A taken from the instance specified by the parameter.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the InstanceData class, using the specified sample and performance counter instance.

remarks.format:

Docs.value: The raw value read by the performance counter sample associated with the property.

Docs.summary: Gets the performance counter sample that generated this data.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example creates an <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceData> and gets the value of its <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.Sample%2A> property, which is a reference to a <xref:System.Diagnostics.CounterSample>. The example then displays the fields of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CounterSample>.
[!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo/CS/instdatacopyto.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.CopyTo/VB/instdatacopyto.vb#3)]
